meanings.sent1: The salad was fatless, with only fresh vegetables and a light dressing.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a fatless yogurt for her breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The fatless chicken was so lean, it looked like it had been on a diet!
meanings.sent4: The fatless landscape of the desert stretched endlessly under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The fatless fish fillet was so delicate and tender, it practically melted in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The fatless meat was perfect for those watching their cholesterol intake.
meanings.sent2: The fatless milk was a healthier option for the family.
meanings.sent3: The fatless cake was a hit at the party, proving that healthy can be delicious too!
meanings.sent4: Her fatless arms were like twigs, showing her dedication to fitness.
meanings.sent5: The fatless soup was so pure and light, it felt like a warm hug for my stomach.
